items.title: Psoriasis forecasts could be like weather forecasts
items.text: Just like data from many satellites can be used to forecast your local weather, our research is based on many people like you measuring your skin and joints with a smartphone and studying this combined data to make forecasts of psoriasis outcomes

items.title: Predicting treatment response and arthritis risk
items.text: In the Psorcast research study, we hope to forecast which drugs might work best for certain people and who is at greatest risk of getting psoriatic arthritis

items.title: Contribute to research and make your Psorcast movie
items.text: Each weekly Psorcast measure makes an image, and we’ll combine them into movies of how your symptoms change over time for you to use however you’d like.

items.title: Try out Psorcast today!
items.text: Feel free to try out the Psorcast measurements before joining the research study. None of the measurement data will be saved.
